data.name: Ultima Adventum Guide
data.detailed_description:
A strategy guide for the RPG Ultima Adventum.

It contains:
- Detailed Step by Step Walkthrough for the Main Story
- Map Screenshots to helpin exploration
- Detailed Step by Step Walkthrough for the Sidequests
- List of all Treasures contained in game
- Location of all Secret Rooms
- Location of all Optional Dungeons
- Location of all Ultimate Weapons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
